newsitem.title: NETHERLANDS: VNU BUYS CZECH PUBLISHER KWETY CESKE.
newsitem.headline: VNU BUYS CZECH PUBLISHER KWETY CESKE.

text.p: Dutch publisher NV Verenigd Bezit VNU said on Thursday it had bought publisher Kwety Ceske of the Czech Republic via its Czech unit Mona.

VNU said in a statement Kwety Ceske publishes the general interest weekly magazine Kvety which has a paid circulation of 280,000 copies and a readership of around one million. Kwety Ceske also publishes the weekly magazine Astro.
"The acquisition fits in with the policy VNU has of broadening out its presence in the Czech consumer publications market," VNU said.
Following the acquisition of the Kvety and Astro magazines, and the weekly magazine Ring in April, Mona is the largest publisher of consumer magazines in the Czech Republic.
